result.execSummary:
The defendant Zachery L Shaffer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Stalking - Prev Conviction Violent Crime, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.32(2m)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant is NOT eligible for the Challenge Incarceration or Substance Abuse Program.
Consecutive to: any other sentence.

superMiscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Follow assessment recommendations.
Follow rules and pay fees of supervision.  
Submit DNA sample WAIVED.
Pay monthly. 
Comply with Sex Offender Registry.
No Contact with Victims (not allowed within 1 mile of the victims residence)
06/22/16 Court allows defendant to work at J&B Auto Located at 5203 Country Club Road.
